languages.text: "Вся ваша гнилая суть именно в этом! Брать правдивые слова и извращать их ложью! Нет, это мы положим конец безумию. Пасынки, в атаку!"
"That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"
languages.original_text: "Вся ваша гнилая суть именно в этом! Брать правдивые слова и извращать их ложью! Нет, это мы положим конец безумию. Пасынки, в атаку!"

traits.locale_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them with lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"
"That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them with lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"
"That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

"That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"
"That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

languages.text: «¡Eso captura a la perfección su esencia pútrida! ¡Toma verdades y las convierte en mentiras! No, acabaremos con esta locura. ¡Hijastros, al ataque!».
languages.original_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso captura a la perfección su esencia pútrida! ¡Toma verdades y las convierte en mentiras! No, acabaremos con esta locura. ¡Hijastros, al ataque!».

languages.text: “你终于露出了腐化的真面目！你将真理扭曲成了谎言！可你错了，我们才要让这场疯狂彻底结束。继子团，开火！”
languages.original_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

traits.locale_text: “你终于露出了腐化的真面目！你将真理扭曲成了谎言！可你错了，我们才要让这场疯狂彻底结束。继子团，开火！”

languages.text: 「まさにあんたの腐った本質を的確に捉えている！真実を奪い、嘘にねじ曲げる！いいや、俺たちがこの頭のおかしいやつを黙らせる。連れ子たち、攻撃だ！」
languages.original_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

traits.locale_text: 「まさにあんたの腐った本質を的確に捉えている！真実を奪い、嘘にねじ曲げる！いいや、俺たちがこの頭のおかしいやつを黙らせる。連れ子たち、攻撃だ！」

languages.text: « En voilà, un témoignage éloquent de votre essence corrompue ! Vous vous emparez de vérités pour les transformer en mensonges ! Détrompez-vous, c'est nous qui allons mettre un terme à cette folie. À l'attaque, enfants de l'Imperium ! »
languages.original_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

traits.locale_text: « En voilà, un témoignage éloquent de votre essence corrompue ! Vous vous emparez de vérités pour les transformer en mensonges ! Détrompez-vous, c'est nous qui allons mettre un terme à cette folie. À l'attaque, enfants de l'Imperium ! »

languages.text: "Kokuşmuş tabiatını gösterdin! Gerçekleri alıp yalana dönüştürüyorsun! Hayır, bu çılgınlığa biz son vereceğiz. Üvey Evlatlar, saldırın!"
languages.original_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

traits.locale_text: "Kokuşmuş tabiatını gösterdin! Gerçekleri alıp yalana dönüştürüyorsun! Hayır, bu çılgınlığa biz son vereceğiz. Üvey Evlatlar, saldırın!"

languages.text: "Das spiegelt Eure verdorbene Essenz perfekt wider. Ihr verdreht wahre Worte zu Lügen! Nein, wir machen diesem Irrsinn ein Ende. Stiefkinder, greift an!"
languages.original_text: "That perfectly captures your rotten essence! You take true words and twist them into lies! No, we will put an end to the madness. Stepchildren, attack!"

traits.locale_text: "Das spiegelt Eure verdorbene Essenz perfekt wider. Ihr verdreht wahre Worte zu Lügen! Nein, wir machen diesem Irrsinn ein Ende. Stiefkinder, greift an!"
